message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to present you with the opportunity to purchase this exclusive product. Considering its value, I'm offering it to you for $1400000. Let me know what you think!
Thanks Alice, but I think $1400000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $1100000 for the product.

I appreciate your response, Bob. While I understand your position, I believe the value of the product is higher. How about we settle at $1350000? I think itâ€™s a fair compromise. Looking forward to your thoughts!
I understand your perspective Alice, but I think we can do better. I'm willing to raise my offer to $1200000.
